> Project Part: Versatile Framework (10/min)
  # Alternate: Flexible Framework:
    | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
        - 5 Modular Frame(s)
        - 30 Steel Beam(s)
        - 40 Rubber(s)
        - 55 MW(s)
        * 1 Manufacturer(s)
        * 342 m^2(s) (about 6 foundations minus belt space)
        * 2 steps into the chain from the top.
        ++ 10 Project Part: Versatile Framework per minute
    |- Modular Frame (5/min)
        # Alternate: Bolted Frame:
          | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
              - 7.5 Reinforced Iron Plate(s)
              - 140 Screws(s)
              - 15 MW(s)
              * 1 Assembler(s)
              * 150 m^2(s) (about 3 foundations minus belt space)
              * 4 steps into the chain from the top.
              ++ 5 Modular Frame per minute
          |- Reinforced Iron Plate (7.5/min)
              # Alternate: Adhered Iron Plate:
                | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
                    - 22.5 Iron Plate(s)
                    - 7.5 Rubber(s)
                    - 30 MW(s)
                    * 2 Assembler(s)
                    * 300 m^2(s) (about 5 foundations minus belt space)
                    * 6 steps into the chain from the top.
                    ++ 7.5 Reinforced Iron Plate per minute
                |- Iron Plate (22.5/min)
                    # Alternate: Coated Iron Plate:
                      | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
                          - 15 Iron Ingot(s)
                          - 3 Plastic(s)
                          - 15 MW(s)
                          * 1 Assembler(s)
                          * 150 m^2(s) (about 3 foundations minus belt space)
                          * 8 steps into the chain from the top.
                          ++ 22.5 Iron Plate per minute
                      |- Iron Ingot (15/min)
                          # Alternate: Iron Alloy Ingot:
                            | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
                                - 6 Iron Ore(s)
                                - 6 Copper Ore(s)
                                - 16 MW(s)
                                * 1 Foundry(s)
                                * 90 m^2(s) (about 2 foundations minus belt space)
                                * 10 steps into the chain from the top.
                                ++ 15 Iron Ingot per minute
                          # Alternate: Pure Iron Ingot:
                            | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
                                - 8.0769 Iron Ore(s)
                                - 46.154 Water m^3
                                - 30 MW(s)
                                * 1 Refinery(s)
                                * 200 m^2(s) (about 4 foundations minus belt space)
                                * 10 steps into the chain from the top.
                                ++ 15 Iron Ingot per minute
                          # Standard: Iron Ingot:

                                * 1 Smelter(s)
                                * 54 m^2(s) (about 1 foundations minus belt space)
                                * 10 steps into the chain from the top.
                                ++ 15 Iron Ingot per minute
